main event: Mr. John Doe reported observing a silvery, disc-shaped UFO hovering over a nearby field in Youngstown, Ohio on March 6, 1967.
interesting points: The UFO was approximately 30 feet in diameter and displayed no visible means of propulsion., Mr. Doe observed the object for several minutes before it suddenly accelerated and departed at high speed., A photograph of the UFO was taken before it disappeared and was forwarded to Project Blue Book for analysis., Another witness, Mr. James Jaskiew, reported seeing a 200-foot diameter gray circular UFO a few days later., The investigation concluded the object was unidentified.
witness description: John Doe and James Jaskiew, residents of Youngstown
